Hi All

I was windering while I was washing and ironing the
other day...

Did the Japanese in fuedal times have irons.

If not how did they manage to get there kimono hakama
etc pressed, and those cresses in the hakama etc in
place.

After all silk always looks creased to death when it
dries.

Paul
